markdown:
Whereas typical [djinn](/Monsters.aspx?ID=212) can cleanse or clear areas with their arcane winds, the air magic of muurfeli is tainted by the Black Desert's noxious radiation and mixed with the realm's ambient fetid winds. **[Recall Knowledge - Elemental](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 40 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 38 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 35 [Muurfeli](/Monsters.aspx?ID=873) **Source** [Pathfinder #155: Lord of the Black Sands](/Sources.aspx?ID=33) pg. 78 **Perception** +30; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [_detect magic_](/Spells.aspx?ID=66) **Languages** [Auran](/Languages.aspx?ID=15), [Undercommon](/Languages.aspx?ID=11) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +33, [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +27, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +31, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +28, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +31 **Str** +7 **Dex** +9 **Con** +5 **Int** +5 **Wis** +3 **Cha** +6 **Items** _+2 [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [scimitar](/Weapons.aspx?ID=38)_ --- **AC** 39 **Fort** +25 **Ref** +31 **Will** +27 **HP** 300 **Resistances** fire 15, poison 15 **Weaknesses** cold 10 **Firedamp Winds** ([air](/Traits.aspx?ID=5), [aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206)) 30 feet, DC 33. Swirling winds of noxious, flammable gas surround a muurfeli. An open flame, spark, or similar fire effect in the area causes an explosion that deals 20d6 fire damage to all creatures in the aura (including the muurfeli) and temporarily disables the aura for 1 minute. When the muurfeli takes damage from an ability with the [water](/Traits.aspx?ID=165) trait or fails a saving throw against a water effect, their firedamp winds aura is disabled for 1 minute. A creature that enters or begins its turn in the aura must attempt a Fortitude save.
**Critical Success** The creature is unaffected.
**Success** The creature is [sickened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34).
**Failure** The creature is sickened 2.
**Critical Failure** The creature is sickened 2 and [fatigued](/Conditions.aspx?ID=15). --- **Speed** 35 feet, fly 50 feet **Melee** fist +29 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 3d10+15 bludgeoning plus 2d6 poison **Melee** _scimitar_ +31 ([Forceful](/Traits.aspx?ID=180), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192), [Sweep](/Traits.aspx?ID=194)), **Damage** 3d6+17 slashing plus 2d6 poison **Ranged** fetid winds +31 ([Air](/Traits.aspx?ID=5), [Evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [range increment 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)), **Damage** 2d8+7 bludgeoning plus 2d8+5 poison **Arcane Innate Spells** DC 36 - **2nd** [Enhance Victuals](/Spells.aspx?ID=101) (at will) - **4th** [Burning Hands](/Spells.aspx?ID=30) (at will), [Gaseous Form](/Spells.aspx?ID=129), [Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=164) (at will; self only) - **5th** [Illusory Creature](/Spells.aspx?ID=158) - **7th** [Cloudkill](/Spells.aspx?ID=42) - **Constant (4th)** [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66) **[Change Shape](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=8)** ([Arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11), [Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Polymorph](/Traits.aspx?ID=127), [Transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157)) The muurfeli can take on the form of an owl. The owl form always looks the same, but the muurfeli can choose to become either Tiny or Small in this form. This transformation doesn't change their Speed or the attack and damage bonuses of their Strikes, but might change the damage type their Strikes deal (typically to slashing).
name: Muurfeli
